prompt:
You will write a story with dialogs, details, and anecdotes, using figures of speech when necessary, organized in ten chapters.
This story will use the elements in the following pages.
When you are ready to receive the first page of story elements, answer [ready].
When you have received a page of story elements and wait for the next one, answer [continue]
Once you have received the last page, you’ll start writing the story by its first chapter.
